description: Interact with WebWeaver based online learning platforms OpenWebWeaver allows you to interact with WebWeaver based online leaning platforms. Credentials provided by your institution are required in order to use this app. Tasks Read, edit and create tasks Board notifications Read, edit and create board notifications Contacts Read, edit and create contacts Notes Read, edit and create notes Messenger Send and receive messages Mail service Send and receive emails File storage Upload and download files from file storage System notifications View system notifications Forum Read forum posts and comments
